title: Lead Developer
responsibilities: Led a team of developers, and trained them in using the MERN stack.
Developed server-side logic and ensured responsiveness to requests from the front-end by using other libraries and frameworks such as Express.js.
Integrated user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic.
Created and maintained database schemas for the app (mongoDB + mongoose).

title: Graphics Design Intern
responsibilities: Designed marketing materials for print and online distribution.
Assisted with preparing lighting studio or darkroom for members and/or clients.
Assisted with youth program classes and other events at the art center.

title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Worked with the LAMP stack to maintain the front-end and back-end of the website.
Worked on overhauling the front-end of the website.
Refactor and manage the back-end systems for the website.
Manage and maintain website SQL database.

title: Help Desk Support Technician
responsibilities: Assist with network registration and troubleshoot wireless and wired network issues.
Troubleshoot NetID and login issues.
Provide support via a variety of methods including walk-in, telephone and chat.
Assist with various types of malware on personal computers of students, faculty and staff.

company: University of Rochester - Web Design & Development
title: Teaching Assistant
responsibilities: Held office hours to ensure students understand course concepts.
Led a lab to assist with lab assignments.
Graded homework assignments and projects.

title: Mobile Engineering Intern
responsibilities: Worked in a team in building fully functional web applications, using various front-end and back-end technologies, following AGILE methodologies.
Worked to optimize code for better load times and SEO.
Worked with Robot Framework in automating web page tests.

title: Barista
responsibilities: Prepared and served drinks and food in accordance with health codes and café standards.
Worked on registers daily to authorize returns and exchanges.
Performed all support tasks such as cleaning cases and equipment, and restocking display cases.
Maintained café cleanliness at all times, including cleaning tables, maintaining condiment bar, and removing trash.
